title: What do singers do when they are out of breath on stage? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just means that they need to do more cardio and practice. The moment you are out of breath means you are out of shape. (Unless of course this is a medical condition, you might need to see a doctor. )This just involves the singer to work out more, and practice training to hold their breath more and exhaling the correct amount of air required for a song.

I sing before groups at least twice a week. I never get out of breath because: I constantly rehearse my vocals such that the phrasing is worked outI actually perform as I rehearse and I rehearse as I perform“singers” that don’t do that will get out of breath That doesn’t directly answer the root problem in your question but it does indirectly by illustrating a way to avoid the problem altogether.
